full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I SGO NAS GA-YANG GI GZO RDOL BCOS PA'I CHO GA GSO BYED BKRA SHIS KUN BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES 'DOD KHAMS DBANG PHYUG MA'I SGO NAS GA-YANG GI GZO RDOL BCOS PA'I CHO GA GSO BYED BKRA SHIS KUN BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DGE TSUL BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, GA-YANG GI GZO RDOL BCOS PA'I YIG RNYING GZHIR BYAS NAS RJE DRUNG BZHAD RDOR GYI GA-YANG 'GONG MNAN THABS DANG, DAM PA GONG MA'I GZHUNG NAS CUNG ZAD KHA BSKANG STE BTZUN GZUGS MKHAN KHRI BSAM 'GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BKRA SHIS ZLA BA'I YAR NGO'I TSES ? 'PHEL SBYOR BA'I NYIN MOR SBYAR BA'I @022B YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS SO, ,BKRA SHIS 'DZAM GLING KUN TU KHYAB PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
